title: Dire Wolves!
body: Let's go Douche Wolves. So sick of rooting for Korea.

replies.body: They suck so bad! Every lanes lost on their own. Such terrible rotation and communication when they get dove or over extend in river.
DemonEmp, we need to find our own LoL team - the team OCE needs and deserves.
Look for bronze, they seem to think they can make it to the top.
